title: A little secret...
content: I've actually been following your work since the very beginning and it's been so cool seeing you grow. You don't know me, but you've inspired me to start my own journey!

title: Serious Question
content: If you could go back to the day you started and give yourself one piece of advice, what would it be? Be honest!

title: Late Night Vibe
content: Is it just me or is coding at 3 AM the only time the brain actually works? Saw you active on GitHub last night, haha!

title: Advice needed
content: How do you stay so consistent? I feel like I burn out every two weeks and it's so frustrating to watch everyone else keep going.

title: Wild Guess
content: I bet you're the type of person who has 50 tabs open but only uses 2 of them. Am I right or am I right?
